Uses of Interface
opendial.inference.InferenceAlgorithm

  • Packages that use InferenceAlgorithm 
    Package Description
    opendial.inference  
    opendial.inference.approximate  
    opendial.inference.exact  

    • Uses of InferenceAlgorithm in opendial.inference

      Classes in opendial.inference that implement InferenceAlgorithm 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SwitchingAlgorithm
      Switching algorithms that alternative between an exact algorithm (variable elimination) and an approximate algorithm (likelihood weighting) depending on the query.
      Methods in opendial.inference that return InferenceAlgorithm 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InferenceAlgorithm SwitchingAlgorithm.selectBestAlgorithm(Query query) 

    • Uses of InferenceAlgorithm in opendial.inference.approximate

      Classes in opendial.inference.approximate that implement InferenceAlgorithm 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SamplingAlgorithm
      Sampling-based inference algorithm for Bayesian networks.

    • Uses of InferenceAlgorithm in opendial.inference.exact

      Classes in opendial.inference.exact that implement InferenceAlgorithm 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NaiveInference
      Algorithm for naive probabilistic inference, based on computing the full joint distribution, and then summing everything.
      class  VariableElimination
      Implementation of the Variable Elimination algorithm NB: make this more efficient by discarding irrelevant variables!
